Text:
Imagine the economic powerhouse the US would be now if the South had won. 
No, I'm not referring to slavery, but to states having more power and Federal having less, and the people having more MONEY! Think of all the money the Federal Government throws away (Trillions) and thank Lincoln.

@tomasSC

Imagine what we could have done with those trillions of dollars we've spent on Bush's wars if so many southernors hadn't voted for him.
I'm looking at a much bigger picture.  we wouldn't HAVE a perversely giant Federal military.  and in turn our foreign relations would be entirely different.
none of us have the SLIGHTEST idea what the US or the world would look like today after such a change so long ago. Butterfly effect people. Predicating global weather is child's play by comparison
